issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Add support for the YARN Shared Cache

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
bq. ./hadoop-mapreduce-project/hadoop-mapreduce-client/hadoop-mapreduce-client-app/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/mapreduce/v2/app/job/impl/TaskAttemptImpl.java:752: private static ContainerLaunchContext createCommonContainerLaunchContext(:3: Method length is 172 lines (max allowed is 150).

{{TaskAttemptImpl#createCommonContainerLaunchContext}} is longer than 150 lines and needs to be refactored.

comments.body: I would like to take this. Thanks!
Sounds great! Thanks [~udai]!
Taking this task as it is fixing a checkstyle issue for MAPREDUCE-5951.

Attached is a v1 patch for trunk. I have split the following out into separate methods:
# Job jar configuration.
# Job conf configuration.
# Token setup.
# External shuffle provider setup.

I did not modify any unit tests because this is a straightforward refactor. Existing coverage should handle this change.

Attached is a branch-2 backport patch.
Reopen this to run precommit job for branch-2
+1 for the branch-2 patch pending Jenkins.
